recommendations.recommendation: Extract product catalog, shopping cart, and checkout into separate microservices for better isolation and testability.
Document API contracts, add OpenAPI specifications, and improve error message clarity for checkout process.
Improve semantic HTML usage and add descriptive ARIA labels. Ensure all interactive elements have clear, accessible names and purposes.
recommendations.aiReasoning: AI semantic analysis detected unclear element purposes and inadequate labeling. Better explainability improves both testing and accessibility.

recommendations.recommendation: Expose more application state through data attributes, ARIA labels, or debug APIs. Make internal states and processes visible for testing.
recommendations.aiReasoning: AI analysis found limited visibility into application logic and state transitions. Transparency enables more reliable assertions.

recommendations.recommendation: Reduce dynamic content and async operations. Add loading indicators and stable element selectors to improve test reliability.
recommendations.aiReasoning: AI stability analysis detected frequent UI changes and timing issues. Stable selectors and predictable behavior reduce test flakiness.

recommendations.recommendation: Refactor monolithic components into smaller, independent modules. Use component-based architecture for better isolation and testability.
recommendations.aiReasoning: AI modularity assessment found tightly coupled components. Better decomposition enables isolated testing and parallel test execution.
